row.process:
!:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SANITY_CHECK :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_REQUIRED.STOP_SERVER ! Check WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory :IF &UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH# = '' : SET &UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH# = "%UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH%" :ENDIF
! Get encrypted password value :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.DEFINE_WSADMIN@WINDOWS
:SET &UC4_PWD# = "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.STOP_SERVER ! :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES ! :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "STOP_SERVER", T ! :SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_stop_server.py") ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" ' ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, 'arb -cmd execute ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&WSADMIN#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-user "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-password "&UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD#" ') ! : IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# <> "localhost" ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-host &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-port &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# ' ) ! : ENDIF ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-f "&FILENAME#" ')
! ! Add list argument of python to command ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_NODE_NAME#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_SERVER_NAME#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_FAIL#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" ') ! : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '&UC4_PWD# ') ! &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
